name: The Trolley Problem: Out of body, Out of Control
name_original: The Trolley Problem: Out of body, Out of Control
description:
The trolley problem is a classic example of being out of control. But maybe now it has a solution?

The characters in this game cannot control themselves, but you have the ghostly ability to possess them one at a time. Use this ability -- coupled with cleverness -- to save everyone from the speeding trolley.

Use WASD to move, click to possess/unpossess
